item.title: Biosensing, Enhanced Senses and Experience Design for Augmented Humans
item.description: This workshop paper explores the intersection of biosensing, enhanced senses, and experience design for augmented humans. It brings together researchers and practitioners to discuss how physiological sensing can create novel human augmentation experiences.
